help.short: Name of the network security group.
Expands referenced resources. Default value is None.

json.schema:
<prop readOnly="True" type="array<@SecurityRule_read>" name="defaultSecurityRules">
<prop readOnly="True" type="array" name="networkInterfaces">
<prop readOnly="True" type="array" name="appliedDnsServers">
<prop readOnly="True" type="array" name="dnsServers">
<prop readOnly="True" type="array" name="ipConfigurations">
<prop readOnly="True" type="array" name="loadBalancerBackendAddressPools">
<prop readOnly="True" type="array<@NetworkInterfaceIPConfiguration_read>" name="backendIPConfigurations">
<prop readOnly="True" type="array<@SubResource_read>" name="loadBalancingRules">
<prop readOnly="True" type="array" name="loadBalancerInboundNatRules">
<prop readOnly="True" type="array" name="ipConfigurations">
<prop readOnly="True" type="array" name="routes">
<prop readOnly="True" type="array<@Subnet_read>" name="subnets">
<prop type="array" name="securityRules">
<prop readOnly="True" type="array<@Subnet_read>" name="subnets">

command.name: delete
command.confirmation: Are you sure you want to perform this operation?

help.short: Name of the network security group.
Name of the network security group.

help.short: A unique read-only string that changes whenever the resource is updated.
